<Text: Trinidad and Tobago League Cup:  Although the league cup is one of the three major domestic trophies attainable by Trinidad and Tobago league teams, it is perceived as a lower priority than the league championship and the FA Trophy.>

Triplets:<Trinidad and Tobago League Cup

Text: Trinidad and Tobago League Cup:  The current theme is "Where Winners Reign", with TT$110,000 to the winner, TT$20,000 to the runners-up, semifinal winners receive TT$7,000, quaterfinal winners receive TT$5,000 and Play-off round winners receive TT$3,000.
